actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-699.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5295, a bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make the monthly earnings test available in limited circumstances in the case of certain beneficiaries, to amend the technical requirements for entitlement to medicare, and to provide that income attributable to services performed before an individual first becomes entitled to old-age insurance benefits shall not be taken into account (after 1977) in determining his or her gross income for purposes of the earnings test.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5295 (Social Security Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5295, a bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make the monthly earnings test available in limited circumstances in the case of certain beneficiaries, to amend the technical requirements for entitlement to medicare, and to provide that income attributable to services performed before an individual first becomes entitled to old-age insurance benefits shall not be taken into account (after 1977) in determining his or her gross income for purposes of the earnings test.
